text: A man pushes his car to a hotel and tells the owner he’s bankrupt. Why?
options: He ran out of gas and can't pay
He is playing Monopoly and landed on the hotel
He is a taxi driver with no passengers
explanation: It's a classic riddle: in Monopoly, landing on someone else's hotel can bankrupt you.

text: A room has a window facing north. A bear walks by the window. What color is the bear?
explanation: Only at the North Pole can all windows face south. The bear would be a polar bear: white.

text: You see a boat filled with people. It hasn’t sunk, yet you don’t see a single person on board. Why?
explanation: 'Single' is the keyword: everyone is married, so you don't see a single person.

text: A doctor and a bus driver love the same woman. The bus driver must go on a week-long trip. He leaves the woman with seven apples. Why?
options: An apple a day keeps the doctor away
explanation: A playful pun: 'An apple a day keeps the doctor away.'
